overview:
Pierluigi Paracchi is Founding Partner of Quantica Sgr. Graduate in Economics at the Cattolica University of Milan, he acquired experience as asset manager at leading european investment banks and top asset management companies. Subsequently, as Senior Fund Manager, he held the position of International Equity Manager at an italian wealth management company.

During his career, he has specialized in innovative high growth sectors, following up companies listed on the American NASDAQ market and on European New Markets, acquiring specific expertise in portfolio risk-return management and in financial analysis.
